name: Scanurmate - Pre Matrimonial Verification
overview:
Scanurmate.com provides you pre-matrimonial services that helps you to have an in depth knowledge about your partner, and have trustworthy relationship thereafter.

Scanurmate.com provides its unique background verification services to help you lead a peaceful married life. In its unique services it include employment verification. In which you get to know whether your partner is doing the same job on same salary which he has told. The job which parents used to before, they are doing, however, it is much more in depth. The other is Education verification, to know if he/she has really studied the same what is being told by him. Then comes criminal checks or police verification
